modName: Dx's Elf Squad - Male Elves Follower
summary: Mer Follower Mod. Altmer, Bosmer, Dunmer and Orsimer. :)
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/VrlRahS.png[/img]
[color=#fff2cc]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]Rune is the Orc who got kicked out his old Camp, he kinda did never really fit in, maybe because of his skin color
Canaan the Dark Elf, he's silent, sometimes a bit rude but all in one a nice guy
Kian is the most friendly High Elf you can meet in whole Skyrim
Khari is the Cousin from Faendal, he knows how to use his bow well[/size][/font][/color][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3]

[color=#fff2cc]Rune eats and sleeps in Markarth's Inn - Silver-Blood Inn
Canaan mostly is around Windhelm - The White Phial
Kian studies in the Collage from Winterhold - Hall of the Elements
Khari live with his Cousin in Riverwood - Faendal's House[/color]

[color=#fff2cc]-Based of my [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89491]Preset Mod[/url]
-No other Mod is needed, but recommanded - Standalone
[/color][color=#fff2cc]-They can't die[/color]
[color=#fff2cc]-All four of them start at lvl 1 and level with the Player, all can be married

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/17814/]SSE Version[/url] ported by Netbadass
[/color]

[b][color=#f1c232][img]https://i.imgur.com/CXRqLIB.png[/img][/color][/b]

[color=#fff2cc]S.A.M - Shape Atlas for Men from vectorplexus.com
Fine Face Textures for Men - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815
Follower Commentary Overhaul - FCO - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52019
Follower Overhaul Mod like EFF, AFT, UFO [/color]


[b][color=#f1c232][img]https://i.imgur.com/Isw6DY5.png[/img][/color][/b]
